comments:
Happens when you have an RCP app with no action sets defined.

Create a "Hello RCP" app with PDE tooling.

add configurer.setShowPerspectiveBar(true); to
ApplicationWorkbenchWindowAdvisor#preWindowOpen

Start app.

Invoke "Customize..." from coolbar.

Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050426-1700
Created an attachment (id=20553)
fix

CheckboxTableViewer#getElementAt may return null
The logic here does more than just restore the selected item, so I've patched it
as follows instead.

Index: CustomizePerspectiveDialog.java
===================================================================
RCS file: /home/eclipse/org.eclipse.ui.workbench/Eclipse
UI/org/eclipse/ui/internal/dialogs/CustomizePerspectiveDialog.java,v
retrieving revision 1.36
diff -u -r1.36 CustomizePerspectiveDialog.java
--- CustomizePerspectiveDialog.java	25 Apr 2005 20:06:42 -0000	1.36
+++ CustomizePerspectiveDialog.java	5 May 2005 19:14:15 -0000
@@ -1769,7 +1769,7 @@
                 }
             }
         }
-        StructuredSelection sel = new StructuredSelection(item);
+        StructuredSelection sel = item == null ? StructuredSelection.EMPTY :
new StructuredSelection(item);
         actionSetsViewer.setSelection(sel, true);
 
         if (showShortcutTab()) {
Actually, this is clearer:

Index: CustomizePerspectiveDialog.java
===================================================================
RCS file: /home/eclipse/org.eclipse.ui.workbench/Eclipse
UI/org/eclipse/ui/internal/dialogs/CustomizePerspectiveDialog.java,v
retrieving revision 1.36
diff -u -r1.36 CustomizePerspectiveDialog.java
--- CustomizePerspectiveDialog.java	25 Apr 2005 20:06:42 -0000	1.36
+++ CustomizePerspectiveDialog.java	5 May 2005 19:17:23 -0000
@@ -1769,8 +1769,10 @@
                 }
             }
         }
-        StructuredSelection sel = new StructuredSelection(item);
-        actionSetsViewer.setSelection(sel, true);
+        if (item != null) {
+        	StructuredSelection sel = new StructuredSelection(item);
+        	actionSetsViewer.setSelection(sel, true);
+        }
 
         if (showShortcutTab()) {
             menusCombo.select(lastSelectedMenuIndex);
Verified in I20050509-2010.
